data.system_settings: iPhone 6S with iOS 11.0.3 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 2
data.actual_result: It appears multiple times depending on how often you click on the reaction button.
data.expected_result: The window with the reactions should only appear one time.
data.short_description: Clicking multiple times on reaction button opens multiple modal windows
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message or have any message where you have the permission to add a reaction - Add a reaction to this message - Now the reaction button next to the previous reactions should appear - Click multiple times on the reaction button
